name: Super Mario MSPaint Rpgmaker Adventure
description:
The only Mario game to feature top of the line MsPaint gramphics!

Just a short little joke game I made in a few weeks for fun! Starring Super Mario! Everyone knows Him! He is within all of us! 

I hope you have aun with it!

WARNING: THIS GAME CONTAINS HEAVY AND/OR SHOCKING SCENES AND/OR SUBJECT MATTER, DISCRETION IS ADVISED.
